AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_invoice_reference_validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_invoice.C_BPartner_ID = @C_BPartner_ID@ and C_invoice.dateinvoiced = @date_invoice_credit@ and C_invoice.grandtotal >= to_number(@grandtotal_invoice@) and C_invoice.issotrx = 'Y' and C_invoice.c_doctype_id not in ( select c_doctype_id from c_doctype where docbasetype = 'ARI_RM' ) and (select substring(name,1,6) from c_doctype where c_doctype_id = C_invoice.c_doctypetarget_id) = substring(@obpos_applications_box@,1,6)
